mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trip_record(trip_record_taxi_idx, trip_record_driver_id, trip_record_start_location, trip_record_end_location, trip_record_distance, trip_record_fare) VALUES (#{trip_record_taxi_idx}, #{trip_record_driver_id}, #{trip_record_start_location}, #{trip_record_end_location}, #{trip_record_distance}, #{trip_record_fare})
INSERT INTO trip_record_detail(trip_record_idx, trip_record_latitude, trip_record_longitude) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3})
mapper.select: SELECT trip_record_date FROM trip_record ORDER BY trip_record_date ASC LIMIT 1

select trip_record_idx, (SELECT t.taxi_license_plate FROM taxi t WHERE t.taxi_idx = tr.trip_record_taxi_idx) AS trip_license_plate, (SELECT driver_name FROM driver d WHERE d.driver_idx = tr.trip_record_driver_id) AS trip_record_driver_name, trip_record_date, trip_record_start_location, trip_record_end_location, trip_record_distance, trip_record_fare FROM trip_record tr WHERE trip_record_idx = #{param1}
SELECT trip_record_latitude AS latitude, trip_record_longitude AS longitude FROM trip_record_detail WHERE trip_record_idx = #{param1} ORDER BY trip_record_detail_idx
